name: TriumphAnt
description:
Marie Ant Oinette, the queen of FrAnts, would like to eat cake on the other side of the River Seine. If her subjects can be joined together into a bridge she will be... TriumphAnt!

OBJECTIVE:

Launch ants across the screen to build a bridge. Score higher by increasing the challenge level and using fewer ants.

Smaller ants fly more quickly!

CONTROLS:

  • Mouse up/down: move
  • Mouse left/right: rotate
  • Scroll wheel or W/S: change size
  • Mouse click: launch

Made by the Humphreys Syndicate for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

Leaderboard by Carmine T. Guida: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/network/dreamlo-com-free-instant-lea...
